code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Home.css';import pexelsTima3 from'../assets/pexels-tima3.jpg';import pexelsShipping1 from'../assets/pexels-shipping1.jpg';import homepic1 from'../assets/homepic1.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[trackingNumber,setTrackingNumber]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleTrack=()=>{if(trackingNumber.trim()){navigate(`/track/${trackingNumber.trim()}`);}};const cardData=[{title:'Xpress Delivery',text:'Speedy and reliable deliveries across the globe.',image:pexelsTima3},{title:'24/7 Tracking',text:'Track your packages/goods anytime with real-time updates.',image:pexelsShipping1},{title:'Secure Packaging',text:'We handle your items with top-level security and care.',image:homepic1}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container py-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"home-title text-center mb-3",children:"Welcome to CenturyXpress"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"home-subtitle text-center mb-4",children:"Fast. Trusted By Millions Worldwide."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tracking-box mb-5 d-flex justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group w-100",style:{maxWidth:'500px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Enter Tracking Number",value:trackingNumber,onChange:e=>setTrackingNumber(e.target.value),onKeyDown:e=>e.key==='Enter'&&handleTrack()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary px-4",onClick:handleTrack,children:"Track"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:cardData.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card h-100 shadow-sm border-0 position-relative overflow-hidden",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-image-overlay",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:card.image,className:"card-img-top",alt:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:card.text})]})]})})},index))})]});}export default Home;
